reviewText: This is a VERY special release. It is a COMBINED release of Ghost Hunters: Best of Vol. 1 and Vol. 2 - Scary Savings Pack And... the never released: "GHOST HUNTERS REVELATIONS" ___________________________ This is absolutely WONDERFUL, and well-worth what I paid for it!
I sure hope that this blu ray also pops the popcorn and gets the drinks for you especially at that price.
